column1: Tell me about a weekend in a mountain cabin in 150 words and then tell me about the Saint Louis Arch in another 150 words. Start the second paragraph with "On a lovely Sunday morning the roadways are bustling"

Tell me about a weekend in a mountain cabin in 150 words and then subtly tell me about disconnecting from technology in another 150 words without explicitly using that language. Only do that. Make sure you don’t add any headings or comments
